REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2590 reute r f BC-GENOVA-<GNVA>-TO-MERG 03-30 0049

TEXT.TITLE: GENOVA <GNVA> TO MERGE INTO GENOVA PRODUCTS
TEXT.BODY: Genova Inc said its shareholders approved a merger into <Genova Products Inc>, which will be consumated within a few days. Under the agreement, Genova said each of its shareholders will receive 5.375 dlrs per share in cash. Reuter
